items.content_html: Is there any alternative to Lightroom that doesn’t charge a subscription fee? I’m wanting to improve my photo import workflow since I currently use Photos.app exclusively (importing everything and usually keeping it all too). I’m hoping there’s an Acorn or Pixelmator equivalent to it.
Been off the communication grid for the last few days. What did I miss?
I just found out about @objcMembers and now my Swift 4 migration for the zulily app is going to be WAY smoother. Scroll to the bottom of this page

After using Messages on my iPhone in iOS 11 for the past couple of days I’m convinced that the new bottom row of app icons is there for the new iPhone Pro (or whatever it’s called). It’s super inconvenient to not have the text field at the very bottom of the screen.
Pulling the trigger and installing iOS 11 b5 on my carry phone. media.giphy.com/media/OCu…
I have slain the manual layout dragon!

Embarking on a (hopefully) short journey to move one of our table view cells to Auto Layout. We’ve got the same class being used on iPhone and iPad in storyboards for each device, but it’s AL on iPhone and not on the iPad.
Pro Tip: The swift.org instructions for Linux installations aren’t complete. Check out the bug report if you’re getting a libpython error.
Taking my first crack at installing Swift on Linux. Been working to port my company website from sailsjs to Swift using Vapor. It’s quite nice so far.
Meetings, meetings, meetings. Today was full of meetings. But now the day is done and we go to the ocean tomorrow!
